column5: Private Room in Euless about 10 min from DFW Airport SouthEntrance.  Great option for quick overnight to catch an early flight or overnight transit/connection at DFW.   Shared bathroom with my room mate.   Ideal for 1 guest only. The bed can sleep 2 people but very tightly.   2 grocery stores as well as many places to eat right across the street.
column8: Private Room. DFW Airport Layover 7 min away
